txt.en:
'The Corsairs have been raiding Tol Fennas for food and supplies heavily these past few days. They've been catching more than they can eat and have set up small cages around the island, holding the creatures where they were caught.

'Freeing the creatures from the cages will disrupt the Corsairs' food supply, cause them confusion and delay in having to hunt them again, and hopefully save the animals as well.

'Take a boat from the harbour to Tol Fennas. Search the shorelines for cages and free the animals within.'
Dimlas is in Dol Amroth.\n\nDimlas will be pleased to hear you freed many animals.
The Corsairs have set up cages at several spots around the island, holding small animals captive.
'In a few days' time we will need to return again, perhaps to free the same animals. But for now, they are safe and the Corsairs are delayed.'
Cages can be found on the shorelines of Tol Fennas.\n\nDimlas asked you to free animals from cages on Tol Fennas. A boat in the harbour of Dol Amroth can take you to Tol Fennas.
